title: I feel worse then a noob...
description:
I was looking for gregtech probably too long, found some for 1.6.4 but not even one of them is working for me. What am I doing wrong?

yes, I have read forum with gregtech and IC2

http://forum.industrial-craft.net/index.php?page=Thread&threadID=7156

I have this one:

zipped gregtechmod408s

yes, I have minecraft 1.6.4
yes, I have IC2 experimental
yes, I have forge 965
yes, I have genuine minecraft
yes, I have deleted configs, mods, everything and tryed probably all possible combinations

Gregtech is just not working for me.

Any help for desperate crafter?

replies.body: If you could post the forge log (pastebin or something like), we may be able to help you.

this is with all mods I want together

http://pastebin.com/zLUbqd75

it works without gregtech 100%
Gregtech needs like IC2 290 or something pretty high I think try getting the last version (297) and trying again. Outright it's not Gregtech crashing though, it's ICBM.

I tryed even without any othger mods, just with needed mods like IC2 and still crashing

got IC2 industrialcraft-2_2.0.357-experimental

IC2 #397 is the final 1.6.4 release of IC2. Are you using the most recent versions of everything? Because any version mismatches can have odd problems. The final releases of GregTech did require the final versions of IC2 to work (due to some changes in the recipe system).
(So, try with IC2 #397)
Also, what version of ICBM are you using?
(Also also, can you pastebin the crashlog you get with nothing but IC2 and GregTech?  In particular, do you get a crash without ICBM?)

dowloaded IC2 397, railcraft was causing troubles, so I updated railcraft to latest version...this is what I get...

http://pastebin.com/RF7FaDrG
I have removed ICBM completely, its disaster mod...

this is IC2 397 + gregtech only:

http://pastebin.com/Z7KrexmK

I started with fres minecraft and downloaded mods one by one, gregtech is finally working :-)

only problem is personal safe is not working with trade-o-mat

Yeah if you can get a fresh start to work, rebuild the mod pack from the ground up.  ICBM is a bit of a disaster mod (partially because its purpose is to cause disasters for your enemies), but if you absolutely, positively need to blow up every other user in the server, accept no substitutes.
